document.full_text: taiwanese smartphone maker htc plans to bring out phones based on microsoft's new mango windows phone software, which was launched on tuesday, htc chief executive peter chou said on wednesday.
document.title: htc ceo says windows mango phones in development
lines_and_colors: taiwanese smartphone maker htc plans to bring out phones based on microsoft's new mango windows phone software, which was launched on tuesday, htc chief executive peter chou said on wednesday.
